description: Giant Hyssop (Agastache 'Purple Haze') is an amazing plant species due to its gorgeous appearance and hardiness. This sprawling shrub is known for its vibrantly colored purple and lavender-hued flowers and bright green foliage. The blooms attract many different types of butterflies and bees, making it a great plant for pollinators. Plus, it is drought-tolerant and requires little maintenance. Ideal for gardeners of all experience levels, it is sure to be an eye-catching addition to any outdoor space.
